column3:
Your chocobo is not carrying a race item.
Open a treasure coffer on the course to obtain one.
Prevents stamina reduction for 10 seconds. If stamina is zero, a small amount is restored.
Summons a quick burst of speed.
Allows a previously used race ability to be executed again.
Sends the forerunning chocobo into a Frenzied state.
Afflicts the forerunning chocobo with Heavy.
Surrounds your chocobo with a ring of thorns which will sap the stamina of any chocobos that enter.
Invigorates your chocobo for 15 seconds, increasing its overall performance while nullifying any enfeeblements.
Summons a meteor from the heavens to wreak havoc on all other chocobos.
Interchanges your chocobo's stamina with that of a forerunning chocobo. Swap is made only if the forerunning chocobo has more stamina than yours.
Renders the chocobo running immediately behind you unable to use items.
